trans-unit.source: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en Web.config-filen for en SOAP-aktiverte COM +-programmet.

trans-unit.source: Can also add component entries to the file for COM interfaces being published in the application.
trans-unit.target: Kan også legge til komponenten oppføringer filen for COM-grensesnitt som publiseres i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The ServerWebConfig class is used to create a Web.config file during creation of a virtual root in Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ServerWebConfig brukes til å opprette en Web.config-filen under oppretting av en virtuell rotmappe i Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 for SOAP-aktiverte COM +-programmet.

trans-unit.source: It also can add XML elements to the Web.config file for component interfaces being added to the application.
trans-unit.target: Det kan også legge til XML-elementer i Web.config-filen for komponentgrensesnitt som legges til programmet.

trans-unit.source: ServerWebConfig is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: ServerWebConfig er brukt internt av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å bruke den direkte i koden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ServerWebConfig"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ServerWebConfig"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds XML elements to a Web.config file for a COM interface being published in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: Legger til XML-elementer i Web.config-filen for et COM-grensesnitt som er publisert i SOAP-aktiverte COM +-programmet.

trans-unit.source: For the specified type, the AddElement method adds to the Web.config file the `<wellknown>` and `<activated>` elements as children of the `<service>` element with the following XPath: `/configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service` The `AssemblyName`, `TypeName`, `ProgId`, and `WkoMode` parameters are incorporated into the attribute values of the two added elements.
trans-unit.target: For den angitte typen metoden AddElement legger til filen Web.config i `<wellknown>` og `<activated>` elementer som underordnede av den `<service>` element med følgende XPath: `/configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service` den `AssemblyName`, `TypeName`, `ProgId`, og `WkoMode` parametere er inkludert i attributtverdier for de to tillagte elementene.

trans-unit.source: AddElement should not be called directly.
trans-unit.target: AddElement skal ikke kalles direkte.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessServerTlb%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I stedet kalle den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessServerTlb%2A>metoden.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessServerTlb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path of the existing Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Banen til den eksisterende Web.config-filen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly that contains the type being added.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på samlingen som inneholder typen som legges til.

trans-unit.source: The name of the type being added.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på typen som legges til.

trans-unit.source: The programmatic identifier for the type being added.
trans-unit.target: Program-IDen for typen som legges til.

trans-unit.source: A string constant that corresponds to the name of a member from the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.WellKnownObjectMode"></xref> enumeration, which indicates how a well-known object is activated.
trans-unit.target: En strengkonstant som tilsvarer navnet på et medlem fra den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.WellKnownObjectMode"> </xref> opplisting som angir hvordan et kjent objekt er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skrive en feilmelding som en streng.

trans-unit.source: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application so that the file is ready to have XML elements added for COM interfaces being published.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en Web.config-filen for en SOAP-aktiverte COM +-programmet slik at filen er klar til å ha XML-elementer som er lagt til for COM-grensesnitt publiseres.

trans-unit.source: The Create method creates a Web.config file that contains the hierarchy for an empty element with the following XPath: ``` /configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service ``` Instead of instantiating a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ServerWebConfig> class object and calling Create directly, call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Create oppretter en Web.config-fil som inneholder hierarkiet for et tomt element med følgende XPath: ``` /configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service ``` i stedet for å starte en <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ServerWebConfig>klasse objekt og kaller Opprett direkte, kall den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>metoden.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ServerWebConfig>

trans-unit.source: The folder in which the configuration file should be created.
trans-unit.target: Mappen konfigurasjonsfilen skal opprettes.

trans-unit.source: The string value "Web", to which a config extension is added.
trans-unit.target: Strengverdien "Web", som en config-filtype er lagt til.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skrive en feilmelding som en streng.
